Class RmiGameClientUpdater

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.updater.GameClientUpdater
it.polimi.ingsw.client.network.rmi.RmiGameClientUpdater
All Implemented Interfaces:
RmiGameUpdater, GameUpdater, Remote
class RmiGameClientUpdater extends GameClientUpdater implements RmiGameUpdater
RMI GameClientUpdater implementation which is exported as a remotable object which will be given to the server
